amendment.description: Amendment sought to designate $10 million for use on a cooperative effort with NASA to restart the production of plutonium-238.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the account for the Advanced Research Projects Agency--Energy by $79,640,000 and to decrease the account for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 257 (Roll no. 552).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 257 (Roll no. 552).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Schiff.
